title: Directions for the complete West India pilot : being principally for sailing amongst the Caribbee Islands, Virgin Islands and Porto Rico : also for the Turks Island passage, and Bahama Islands : as well as for the Bay of Honduras, Moskito shore, the Spanish Main, &c. &c.
author: Hester, T. Jefferys
note: Though see [London, Printed for Robert Laurie and James Whittle, 1790s] OCLC Link: http://gw.worldcat.org.proxygw.wrlc.org/oclc/25063906
